titleInfo.title: 2nd Annual Bluegrass and Old Time Mtn. Festival (16756)

mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (black and red on white) announcing the Second Annual Bluegrass and Old Time Mountain Festival with Doc Watson, John Hartford, Ralph Stanley, Jimmy Martin, and others at the WNC Flea Market on August 29, 30, and 31. Poster features metal photoplates of Doc Watson, John Hartford, Ralph Stanley and Jimmy Martin. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/32458.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
